mapper.select: select * from inn_logistics_detail where logistics_id = #{id} order by create_time desc limit 0,1

select OD.id id,OD.order_id orderId,OD.number number,OD.goods_id goodsId, (select goods_title from inn_goods where OD.goods_id=id )as goodsTitle, (select small_picture from inn_goods where OD.goods_id=id )as smallPicture from inn_order_detail OD where OD.order_id = #{id} order by OD.create_time desc

select O.*, (select logistics_no from inn_logistics L where L.id=O.logistics_id )as logisticsNo , (select logistics_name from inn_logistics L where L.id=O.logistics_id )as logisticsName from inn_order O where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into inn_order (id, user_id, order_no, order_status, order_time, pay_time, item_count, total_amount, payment, address_id, logistics_id,pay_channel,escrow_trade_no,customer_mark,invoice,invoice_type,invoice_title,invoice_content) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{itemCount,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{escrowTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{customerMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{invoiceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update inn_order set pay_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
